projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: A static website to give some information about me and showcase some of my programming projects.

projects.title: Baby logger
projects.description: A web app for tracking a baby's feed sessions, diaper changes and sleep durations, with built-in statistics. Features multiple shared accounts.

projects.title: Data dashboard
projects.description: A dashboard with several custom-graphs to check performance and quality of data scraped.
